select a.order_code orderCode, a.order_money orderMoney, a.order_state orderState, a.store_code storeCode, b.user_name userName, b.phone phone, a.create_time createTime from t_order a LEFT JOIN t_sys_user b on a.user_code = b.user_code where a.is_deleted = 0
and a.order_code like concat('%', #{orderCode}, '%')
and b.user_name like concat('%', #{userName}, '%')

select a.user_code userCode, a.order_code orderCode, b.goods_code goodsCode, b.goods_name goodsName, a.order_sum orderSum, a.order_money orderMoney, b.sale_price salePrice, b.cost_price costPrice from t_order_detail a LEFT JOIN t_goods b on a.goods_code = b.goods_code where a.order_code = #{orderCode} and a.is_deleted = 0
